description: Try our easy to follow Caesar Salad With Chicken, Bacon & Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caesar Salad With Chicken, Bacon & Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 75g cooked crispy bacon rashers, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place the ciabatta cubes on a foil-lined grill pan and drizzle over the olive oil. Toast under a preheated medium grill for about 5 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden and crisp.
Meanwhile, roughly tear the lettuce leaves and place in a salad bowl with the chicken and most of the bacon pieces.
Add the toasted bread cubes and salad dressing and toss well to mix. Sprinkle over the reserved bacon pieces and the Parmesan shavings. Serve straight away.
